description:
Take pictures with your HP TouchPad! Leverage your TouchPad's front-facing camera to take great profile shots, or flip it around to take shots of whatever you want! 

Take pictures using your TouchPad's volume keys, and manage your photos in the in-app photo viewer! Like that picture you took? Set it as your TouchPad's wallpaper, right inside of the app, or even email it to a friend! Want to print out a photo? Well now you can, all right from the app! 

All photos taken in the app work with any other webOS application.

=== New in this version: ===
- Photo viewer now loads 3x faster.
- Email photos to friends, right from the photo viewer.
- Print photos, right from the photo viewer.

Need help? Just email us at support@keen-studios.net, and we'll help you to the best of our ability!
versionNote:
